member.name: T:Atata.TriggerPriority
member.summary: Specifies the priority of trigger execution.

member.name: T:Atata.TriggerScope
member.summary: Specifies the scope of trigger application.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerScope.Self
member.summary: Indicates that the trigger applies to the class/member declared.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerScope.Children
member.summary: Indicates that the trigger applies to the child control properties.

member.name: T:Atata.TermCase
member.summary: Specifies the term case.

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Inherit
member.summary: Uses inherited case or none if missing.

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.None
member.summary: Doesn't apply case.

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Title
member.summary: Uses title case (e.g. "Some Term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.TitleWithColon
member.summary: Uses title case with colon (':') ending (e.g. "Some Term:").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Sentence
member.summary: Uses sentence case (e.g. "Some term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.MidSentence
member.summary: Uses mid-sentence case where first word not capitalised (e.g. "some term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.SentenceWithColon
member.summary: Uses sentence case with colon (':') ending (e.g. "Some term:").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Lower
member.summary: Uses lower case (e.g. "some term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.LowerMerged
member.summary: Uses lower case with words merging (e.g. "someterm").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Upper
member.summary: Uses upper case (e.g. "SOME TERM").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.UpperMerged
member.summary: Uses upper case with words merging (e.g. "SOMETERM").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Camel
member.summary: Uses camel case (e.g. "someTerm").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Pascal
member.summary: Uses pascal case (e.g. "SomeTerm").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Kebab
member.summary: Uses dash ('-') and lower case (e.g. "some-term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.HyphenKebab
member.summary: Uses hyphen ('‐') and lower case (e.g. "some‐term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.PascalKebab
member.summary: Uses dash ('-') and pascal case (e.g. "Some-Term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.PascalHyphenKebab
member.summary: Uses hyphen ('‐') and pascal case (e.g. "Some‐Term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.XKebab
member.summary: Uses dash ('-'), lower case and "x-" prefix (e.g. "x-some-term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Snake
member.summary: Uses undersore ('_') and lower case (e.g. "some_term").

member.name: T:Atata.TermMatch
member.summary: Specifies the match approach for the term finding.

member.name: F:Atata.TermMatch.Inherit
member.summary: Uses inherited match or none if missing.
